com.rublon.sdk.login

Class RublonLogin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rublon.sdk.core.RublonConsumer
      • com.rublon.sdk.login.RublonLogin

  • public class RublonLogin
extends RublonConsumer
    Rublon native login service provider class. Create a subclass to override the specific methods.

    • Method Detail

      • auth

        public java.lang.String auth(java.lang.String callbackUrl,
                    org.json.JSONObject consumerParams)
                      throws APIException,
                             RublonException
        Initializes the Rublon login authentication transaction and returns the URL address to redirect user's browser. Notice: to use this method the configurations values (system token and secret key) must be provided to the constructor. If not, function will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        callbackUrl - Callback URL address.
        consumerParams - Additional transaction parameters.
        Returns:
        URL address to redirect.
        Throws:
        APIException
        RublonException

      • auth

        public java.lang.String auth(java.lang.String callbackUrl)
                      throws APIException,
                             RublonException
        Initializes the Rublon login authentication transaction and returns the URL address to redirect user's browser. Notice: to use this method the configurations values (system token and secret key) must be provided to the constructor. If not, function will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        callbackUrl - Callback URL address.
        Returns:
        URL address to redirect.
        Throws:
        APIException
        RublonException

      • getCredentials

        public Credentials getCredentials(java.lang.String accessToken)
                           throws ConnectionException,
                                  APIException
        Authenticate user and get user's credentials using one-time use access token. One-time use access token is a session identifier which will be deleted after first usage. This method can be called only once in authentication process.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - One-time use access token.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException
        APIException
